title: RBS surprises on profit, but traders see a squeeze
text:
RBS surprises on profit, but traders see a squeeze 6:52am EDT - 01:47
Royal Bank of Scotland showed signs of competition squeezing returns and business customers being unhappy with its services on Friday, which combined with a looming Department of Justice fine to overshadow a forecast-beating first quarter profit. David Pollard reports.
Royal Bank of Scotland showed signs of competition squeezing returns and business customers being unhappy with its services on Friday, which combined with a looming Department of Justice fine to overshadow a forecast-beating first quarter profit. David Pollard reports. //reut.rs/2r3ERZq
